      • Player

        public Player(int x,
      int y,
      int mass,
      int width,
      int height,
      Manager m)
        Creates a new player, Rick the Robot
        Parameters:
        x - X of the player
        y - Y of the player
        mass - Mass value of the player(affects falling physics)
        width - Pixel width of the player
        height - Pixel height of the player
        m - Manager object
